glsa.title: Fail2ban: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A flaw in Fail2ban may allow remote attackers to deny access to arbitrary hosts.

background.p: Fail2ban monitors log files for failed authentication attempts and can block hosts responsible for repeated attacks.

description.p: A flaw in the method used to parse log entries allows remote, unauthenticated attackers to forge authentication attempts from other hosts.

impact.p: A remote attacker can add arbitrary hosts to the block list, denying legitimate users access to a resource.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Fail2ban users should upgrade to the latest version:
